title: Miley Cyrus Has Been Hospitalized According To Her Instagram Story
text:
A Wild Summer

Miley Cyrus has had a whirlwind summer. After less than a year of marriage, she and husband Liam Hemsworth filed for divorce. She briefly dated Kaitlynn Carter, and after they broke up, she rebounded from her rebound with actor Cody Simpson. While she has been enjoying dating around and enjoying the single life -- which is her right! -- unfortunately Cyrus has hit a bump in the road and ended up in the hospital with tonsillitis.

A Trip To The Hospital

She posted a picture from her hospital bed to her Instagram stories with a message about her potentially missing the upcoming Gorillapalooza, a concert to raise money for gorilla conservation.

"Trying to heal a quick as possible to make it to Gorillapalooza w @theellenshow, @portiaderossi and @brunomars this weekend! Send gooooood vibes my way! Hoping the Rock star G*DS send me a boost of bad ass and help me kick this sâ€” to the curb where it belongs! We got gorillas to save!"

A Bad Case Of Tonsillitis

Cyrus had posted another selfie earlier with the caption "Tonsillitis is a f-cking f-ck!" Tonsillitis usually requires surgery, but Cyrus has not revealed whether or not she had undergone any procedures at this point.
